The product was delivered 3 days earlier in good packaging. The suit itself was in mint condition. The fit was as depicted in the picture, and appearance matched it as well. Very satisfied with pricing and quality. Great bargain.

I recently purchased a blazer, and I'm extremely pleased with the fit. It contours to my body comfortably and accentuates my silhouette, giving me a polished and confident look. The precise tailoring ensures that it drapes perfectly, making it suitable for both formal and casual occasions. The blazer's versatile fit and classic style have quickly made it a staple in my wardrobe, and I highly recommend it for anyone seeking a well-fitting and stylish addition to their clothing collection.

This blazer from ManQ is truly exceptional. The fit is perfect, the fabric is of high quality, and the attention to detail is evident in every stitch. It's a versatile piece that can be paired up with a trouser or jeans.

One of the things I love most about this blazer is how comfortable it is. The style is also timeless and classic.
